    • Method Detail

      • score

        public static double score(INDArray labels,
           LossFunctions.LossFunction lossFunction,
           INDArray z,
           double l2,
           double l1,
           boolean useRegularization)
        Generic scoring function. Note that an IllegalArgumentException is thrown if the given loss function is custom. An alternative mechanism for scoring (preferrably with a function name and the op factory) should be used instead.
        Parameters:
        labels - the labels to score
        lossFunction - the loss function to use
        z - the output function
        l2 - the l2 regularization term (0.5 * l2Coeff * sum w^2)
        l1 - the l1 regularization term (l1Coeff * sum |w|)
        useRegularization - whether to use regularization
        Returns:
        the score for the given parameters

      • score

        public static double score(INDArray labels,
           LossFunctions.LossFunction lossFunction,
           INDArray z,
           double l2,
           boolean useRegularization)
        Generic scoring function. Note that an IllegalArgumentException is thrown if the given loss function is custom. An alternative mechanism for scoring (preferrably with a function name and the op factory) should be used instead.
        Parameters:
        labels - the labels to score
        lossFunction - the loss function to use
        z - the output function
        l2 - the l2 coefficient
        useRegularization - whether to use regularization
        Returns:
        the score for the given parameters
